Subscribe to server events

Subscribe to these events:
+ pendingTransactions
+ newBlockHeaders
+ syncing
+ logs, options {fromBlock, address, topics}

Emitter events:
+ data, object
+ change, object
+ error, Error

0x number expressions return false but '0x' string expressions true

description:
Reduce function for hexToBytes. It splits by each two characters.
e.g. ['ff', 'aa', 'f5', '55']

description: Put padding to the left. The default padding sign is '0'

params.name: length
params.description: how many of the pad sign

description: Alias to padLeft

name: padRight
description: Put padding to the right. The default padding sign is '0'

params.name: quantity
params.description: how many of the pad sign

name: rightPad

name: bytesToHex

Compute SHA3 256 length hash a.k.a. keccak256

Prepends '0x' string to the result

name: toHex
description:
It's used internally to convert addresses, booleans, objects, strings,
and numbers into hex for solidity sha3.

name: soliditySha3
description: Converts all the arguments into some other format then hashes it with sha3.

name: toChecksumAddress
description:
Convert an Aion address to an Aion Checksum address.

Rather than being all lower or uppercase letters are upper or lower based
on some critera.

description: Convert hex string to javascript number

name: hexToUtf8
description: Convert hex string to utf8 string

content:
# aion_web3

A JavaScript library for interacting with the Aion network.

**If you're porting your Ethereum app to Aion this API is nearly identical. Minimal modifications are necessary if any.**

* [Guide: Porting Ethereum web3-based app to Aion](./docs/guides/porting.md)

## Install

```sh
npm install aion-web3
```

## Documentation

[docs](./docs)
name: ./readme.md

content:
{
  "name": "aion-web3",
  "namespace": "aion",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "aion web3-v1.0.0-compatible api",
  "main": "src/index.js",
  "dependencies": {
    "ajv": "^6.5.0",
    "bignumber.js": "^7.0.1",
    "blake2b": "^2.1.2",
    "bn.js": "^4.11.8",
    "cross-fetch": "^2.2.0",
    "crypto-browserify": "^3.12.0",
    "elliptic": "^6.4.0",
    "js-sha3": "^0.7.0",
    "lodash": "^4.17.10",
    "number-to-bn": "^1.7.0",
    "randomhex": "^0.1.5",
    "rlp": "^2.1.0",
    "safe-buffer": "^5.1.2",
    "scryptsy": "^2.0.0",
    "tweetnacl": "^1.0.0",
    "underscore": "^1.8.3",
    "utf8": "^3.0.0",
    "uuid": "^3.2.1",
    "webpack": "^4.16.1",
    "ws": "^4.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "async": "^2.6.1",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.5",
    "babylon": "^6.18.0",
    "blakejs": "^1.1.0",
    "body-parser": "^1.18.2",
    "crypto-js": "^3.1.9-1",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "5.1.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^2.9.0",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^2.6.2",
    "express": "^4.16.3",
    "http-server": "^0.11.1",
    "istanbul": "^0.4.5",
    "mocha": "^5.2.0",
    "nodemon": "^1.18.2",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.3",
    "prettier": "^1.13.7",
    "should": "^13.2.1",
    "web3-utils": "^1.0.0-beta.34"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "clean": "rm -rf dist .eslintcache",
    "setup-dist": "mkdir -p dist",
    "dev-server": "nodemon -L -d 1 -w test/unit/fixtures/rpc.js -w test/unit/server.js test/unit/server.js || true",
    "dev-eslint": "sleep 1 && nodemon -L -d 1 -w src -w test --exec 'eslint --cache src test' || true",
    "dev-mocha": "sleep 2 && nodemon -L -d 2 -w src -w test --exec 'mocha --opts mocha.opts test/unit' || true",
    "dev": "run-p dev-*",
    "docs-server": "http-server docs/gen -c-1 -a 127.0.0.1 -p 9912 -s",
    "test-eslint": "eslint src test",
    "test-mocha": "mocha --opts mocha.opts test/unit",
    "test": "run-s test-*",
    "prd-prettier": "prettier --config prettier.config.js --write './{src,test}/**/*.js'",
    "prd-docs": "jsdox --output docs src",
    "prd": "run-s clean setup-* prd-* test-*"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/aionnetwork/aion_web3.git"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/aionnetwork/aion_web3",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/aionnetwork/aion_web3/issues"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "aion",
    "web3",
    "json-rpc",
    "jsonrpc"
  ],
  "author": "aionnetwork",
  "authors": [{
    "name": "chris",
    "email": "aion.6368726973@gmail.com",
    "url": "https://github.com/aion-6368726973"
  }],
  "license": "LGPL-3.0"
}
